title: Where to Travel In August?!
text:
Travel Articles | July 15, 2015 
Summer holidays give us the chance to recharge our batteries, explore new destinations, spend time together as a family and soak up some much-needed sun. 
Summer is about to get over and it’s the perfect time to take a vacation before summer flies away. Traveling in this season involves a lot of excursions, expeditions and adventures. So, pack up your bags and take a long break to enjoy the lovely weather, nature’s wonders at your favorite destination. Here are the top destinations that shall be visited in the month of August to take a glimpse of the end of the summer season. Edinburgh, Scotland: The capital city of Scotland has to be on the list of the top places to be visited in the month of August. This beautiful city has a large number of attractions that will blow your mind away. It also organizes a lot of events that can make you feel lucky, Edinburgh Food Festival, Art Festival, Edinburgh Festival Fringe, etc. are the major highlights during the month of August. So, what are you waiting for? Book a flight today and land to this amazing destination with your favorite buddies. Warsaw, Poland: Summers in Warsaw offers the best of this, Poland’s capital city. All you need to do is plan a trip to this alluring land in August and the city welcomes you whole-heartedly. It is the perfect time to experience the best weather along with some incredible tourist destinations that will make your trip worthwhile. International Argentine Tango Festival, The Summer Festival and many more exuberant events can be witnessed during your summer travel . Get your tickets today to know more about this lively destination. Srinagar, India: The heaven on earth, Srinagar is yet another fascinating destination that shall be explored before the summer is over. It is known as the Summer Capital of India and a popular spot that attracts visitors from all over the world. The impeccable charm will leave you awe-struck and you will love to stay here for a long time. Lovely weather, lush landscapes, and a good company of your loved one will make your visit all the more exciting. Plan a trip soon and know more about it. Honolulu, Hawaii: Honolulu is a favorite destination for many travelers. Manoa Falls, Hanauma Bay, Nu’uanu Pali, Diamond Head, etc. are the popular attractions of this city that are enough to give you the experience of an awesome holiday. Apart from this, you can also grab tickets of the live music concerts, festivals and many more events that will help you enjoy your vacation thoroughly. If you haven’t taken your summer vacation yet, better plan it now by booking a flight to Honolulu. Lima, Peru: The bustling metropolis and the capital city of Peru is known for its exquisite food dishes, wonderful spots and its unique culture. August is the perfect time to visit Peru and spend some quality time with your family, friends or your loved one. Museum of Italian Art, Palace of Justice Lima, Torre Tagle Palace, etc. are the top places that shall be visited on your trip. 
Plan a trip soon before the summer season is over to enjoy the best of all these destinations. Source: Free Articles   ABOUT THE AUTHOR
